title: Wow: Mom Travel Mug, Stainless Lined Coffee Tumbler, 16-Ounce -Cute Gift for Mother's Day - Tree-Free Greetings
features: Premium quality 16-ounce travel tumbler coffee mug for hot or cold beverages
Stainless steel inner layer, comfortably curved acrylic outer layer; BPA free and Proposition 65 compliant
Rocket seal prevents condensation from forming between acrylic outer and stainless inner; hand wash only, not dishwasher safe
Beautiful, colorful mom themed art makes a great unique present for the special men and women in your life. Great for coffee lovers.
This travel coffee mug is the perfect Christmas, birthday, thank you, or Mother's Day gift for the special moms in your life to show your appreciation and to let them know you are thinking about them
description: Tree-Free Greetings strives to use the most eco friendly materials and processes possible. Printed and assembled in the USA, The Tree-Free Greetings Sip 'N Go Stainless Steel Lined Travel Tumbler is vibrantly printed with inspirational yet cool Mom themed Contemporary Christian Designs from Kerusso and is great for everyday use. It is reusable therefore eliminating any disposable paper or Styrofoam cup waste. BPA free and Proposition 65 compliant, this beautiful and durable tumbler is stainless steel lined, resists condensation and holds 16 ounces of your favorite hot or cold beverage. To preserve the quality of your tumbler, hand washing is required. The Tree-Free Greetings Sip 'N Go Stainless Steel Lined Travel Tumbler makes the perfect gift or souvenir for any occasion. Save trees and spread joy. Buy a Tree-Free earth-friendly gift today.
